senses.sense_definition: Used exclusively in the phrase 'pepsinhydrochloric acid' to describe a solution containing pepsin and hydrochloric acid, often used to simulate gastric juice.

examples.text: The researcher prepared a solution of <w>pepsinhydrochloric</w> acid to test the rate of protein digestion.
In early physiological studies, artificial gastric juice was often referred to as <w>pepsinhydrochloric</w> acid.
